mapper.select: SELECT ja.*, jp.job_post_title, c.company_name FROM JOB_APPLICATIONS ja JOIN JOB_POSTS jp ON ja.job_post_id = jp.job_post_id JOIN COMPANIES c ON jp.company_id = c.company_id WHERE ja.resume_id = #{resumeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOB_APPLICATIONS WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOB_APPLICATIONS WHERE job_post_id = #{jobPostId} AND resume_id = #{resumeId}

SELECT a.job_application_id AS jobApplicationId, a.job_post_id AS jobPostId, a.resume_id AS resumeId, a.application_at AS applicationAt, a.approve_status AS approveStatus, j.job_post_title AS jobPostTitle, u.user_name AS applicantName FROM JOB_APPLICATIONS a JOIN JOB_POSTS j ON a.job_post_id = j.job_post_id JOIN RESUMES r ON a.resume_id = r.resume_id JOIN USERS u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE j.company_id = #{companyId}
